name: AFGBuildableRailroadBridge
comment: A spline based bridge for rail roads, it can be built between 2 existing foundations, bridge and track is built separately.

methods.name: GetLength
methods.comment: Get the length of the bridge

properties.name: mSplineComponent
properties.comment: The spline component for this bridge.

properties.name: mSplineData
properties.comment: Spline data saved in a compact form for saving and replicating. All the vectors are in local space.
